item.title: K8s Journey 1
item.description: I’ve just started to learn Kubernetes concepts. Here are notes that I might want to look at them later on. Keep in mind that I do not assert these notes to be complete, exact, precise, or correct. If you see any mistake, please reach out to me. Pods Even though the pods might contain multiple containers, all are running on a single worker node; so, it doesn’t work on multiple worker nodes.

item.title: Notes to myself?
item.description: I’ve always wanted to write something on a regular basis. It helps me to clear my mind. Maybe, this blog pushes me to write some posts.
